mean_en: the condition of no longer being used or useful :the condition of being obsolete
word_etyma: obsolesc废弃 + ence名词后缀 → obsolescence 荒废，过时
short_phrase: the obsolescence of the old telephone
sentence: The obsolescence of this old-fashioned phone is one of its charms.
sentence_trans: 这部老式电话的过时性是它的魅力之一。
